title: Woman facing charges after two dogs attack local man, victim says it is not enough
summary:
Woman facing charges after two dogs attack local man, victim says it is not enoughDUQUESNE — “I’m a licensed carrier.
He has a broken thumb, and he had to get stitches after the dogs bit him repeatedly.
I heard it crack when the dog bit me, like a bone.
“He’s healing pretty good.
He’s a soldier he took a pretty good beating,” he added.
